posts.message: HF News was scheduled for either yesterday or today but some things have occurred in real life which obviously hold more priority than HF News. A close person to my heart has actually been diagnosed with cancer and I've been busy with studies already, so I most likely won't be active for 1-2 weeks. This person is one of the most important people in my life and... HF News can wait a few days hopefully.
posts.subject: HF News
